elements.content:
Consolidated Statement of Income

Millions of dollars, except per-share amounts

annotations.comment: 2017 includes excise, value-added and similar taxes of $7,189, collected on behalf of third parties. Beginning in 2018, these taxes are netted in "Taxes other than on income" in accordance with Accounting Standards Update (ASU) 2014-09.
annotations.unFormattedText: 2017 includes excise, value-added and similar taxes of $7,189, collected on behalf of third parties. Beginning in 2018, these taxes are netted in "Taxes other than on income" in accordance with Accounting Standards Update (ASU) 2014-09.
